list_definition.definition: to remove from office or employment

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was dismissed from his post for being lazy.

list_definition.definition: to stop or close (a lawsuit etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The case was dismissed due to a lack of evidence.
